Title: Enthiran
Writer: Madhan Karky (dialogue), Swanand Kirkire (hindi dialogue), S. Shankar (dialogue), S. Shankar (story and screenplay), Sujatha (dialogue)
Actors: Rajinikanth, Aishwarya Rai Bachchan, Danny Denzongpa, Santhanam
Plot: Dr. Vasi, a brilliant scientist, builds Chitti, a unique robot, who is programmed to protect mankind and also feel human emotions. Problems arise when Chitti falls in love with Dr. Vasi's girlfriend.
